name: Mobcast
description: MobCast is the world's most effective platform for group communication on mobile. It's an enterprise mobile app for Employee Engagement, Corporate Communication, Training & Development, Sales Performance, and the likes. It's a web platform that allows any entity/enterprise to broadcast rich content on mobile devices. It enables delivery of content on smart phones, web-enabled phones and feature phones. We serve companies with large, geographically spread, fast growing workforce leveraging the 'MobCast' platform.

enhanced_description: Mobcast is a comprehensive enterprise mobile app and web platform designed for HR, Learning & Employee Engagement. It aims to enable talent and workplace transformation by providing an effective platform for group communication and content broadcasting on mobile devices. The solution supports various HR functions including Employee Engagement, Corporate Communication, Training & Development, Sales Performance, Onboarding, Recruiting, and Talent Management. It is built to serve companies with large, geographically spread, and fast-growing workforces, delivering content across smartphones, web-enabled, and feature phones. Key benefits include boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, accelerating skill development and learning efficiency. The platform offers easy integration with existing HRMS and Active Directory systems, provides 26 types of detailed reports, and is backed by dedicated customer service from Special Account Managers, all while ensuring enterprise-grade security.
